pullrequest.title: Disabled loading/cleanup of globals into builtins, ready for it to be moved to runmanager

content.raw:
Oh, actually. Labscript still puts devices in the builtins dict, so restoring builtins to its previous state is still something labscript will need to do if running in the absence of runmanager.

Then again, we will probably stop using builtins by the time this code is removed, so it doesn't really matter.
content.html:
Oh, actually. Labscript still puts devices in the builtins dict, so restoring builtins to its previous state is still something labscript will need to do if running in the absence of runmanager.

Then again, we will probably stop using builtins by the time this code is removed, so it doesn't really matter.
